specs.title: players should be able to start the game and see questions
should verify question files are accessible
should verify app loads without JavaScript errors
should play through all questions and restart cleanly
should complete full classic mode game flow
should handle rapid question navigation
should maintain game state during navigation
should allow users to start and play the game successfully
should check if questions are actually loading
